message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I know will be invaluable to your business.  While I can't disclose specifics just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1,500,000 to you.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,250,000, a price that reflects both the value of the product and the potential for mutually beneficial growth.  This is a one-time offer, so please consider it carefully.  I'm confident this will be a mutually advantageous deal.
